metadata.title: RHEA-2017:1716: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 3.6 RPM Release Advisory (Important)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is the company's cloud computing Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) solution designed for on-premise or private cloud deployments.

The OpenShift Container Platform 3.6 Release Notes provide information about new features, bug fixes, and known issues:

https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/3.6/release_notes/ocp_3_6_release_notes.html

This advisory contains the RPM packages for this release. See the following advisory for the container images for this release:

https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHBA-2017:1717

bugzilla.text: CVE-2017-1000095 jenkins-plugin-script-security: Unsafe methods in the default whitelist (SECURITY-538)

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-plugin-script-security is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
